price: 16.Kay Rabbi saytunnoowe daqaaray Tuwa deqsital kaah seece waqdi.
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
